::FZ::

The replica (or rather other self) of Zardus turns to look at Squizzy 
after Beholder 2 leaves with Deemos.

"I'm Zardus' clone in a way," he says, "My mind is linked with his 
through the Iron Fist. If he disaproved of Beholder leaving, I 
wouldn't be able to give the order."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Squizzy::
> 
> "UH, yes actually. I need Zardus to see what I have done first. Then 
> you may take him.  Since Zardus is my leader, I must get his 
> permission for you to take Beholder back with yo
